alert.note: Alert for Black Hawk; Tama (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 9:57PM CDT until May 07 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Black Hawk County in northeastern Iowa... Northeastern Tama County in central Iowa... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 957 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Hudson, or 11 miles south of Waterloo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Washburn around 1010 PM CDT. La Porte City and Gilbertville around 1015 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Jesup. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 56 and 66. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
